name: Derby Car Crash Racing Engine
description:
The racing mayhem is about to begin in this never before seen car crashing destruction simulator which is going to be an indestructible stunt and adventure you’ll ever see in your life!!! Download the Derby Car Crash Racing Engine game for a whole new thrilling experience!!
This game is far more exciting than it sounds…. Take your stunt car around for a destructive blow!! Race over the detailed racing tracks for stunts provided!! More than stunts this rampage and mayhem is not any ordinary car crash game but a massive destruction game!!!
You don’t simply crash in other still cars but it is a racing championship between different cars and drivers to crash in to each and cause ultimate racing mayhem!!! Straight in to each other that is how the crashing will work!!! This is more than to test the endurance of your vehicle but instead it is to completely annihilate and cause massive car demolition as you crash the cars in to each other mindlessly!!!
Whether you crash in to random things or actual physical the demolition mission remains the same!!! That is why your fearless racing games driver have been given this opportunity to perform the most dangerous of stunts which contribute in the act of destruction and car demolition!!!
You have been provided a whole platform and an arena and even more than that; freestyle to make that dreamy demolition possible!!!
The intensity of this game is unbeatable and unmatchable!! And it is not only the cars that are being used as objects of wreckage but multiple transport vehicles!!! Such as bus simulator or a truck simulator or even a van simulator and each has the nature and the mission to bump and just immediately run into each other and the car that causes the most damage wins!!!
Consider this situation such as this, there is an enemy simulator car and you are the hero simulator car and to protect your clan you must fight against all other enemy simulator cars!!! Hence, run into each other and cause the immense as possible destruction imaginable!!! Break parts of the cars!!
Just as exciting and intense the game, similarly intense is the game play!! With heavy controls controlling the heavily mechanized crashing cars are there for your service to be controlled by on screen controls!! The considerate game developers have provided with the utmost ease in the game playing process by giving every accessible thing on the screen!! You just have to prove your action skills!!!
*** HOW TO PLAY DERBY CAR CRASH RACING ENGINE ***
• Begin game!
• Start the game play
• Choose the car you want to fight with
• Select the level
• Fight the enemy simulator car using high speed stunt controls on screen
• Take down enemy car, truck, bus, van, etc.
• Hit and crash car into obstacles, or as you please
• Perform each level with higher intensity than before

*** FEATURES OF GAME DERBY CAR CRASH RACING ENGINE ***
• Various kinds of car crashing simulator
• Demolition simulator
• 3D Graphics
• Exciting game play
• On screen controls
